original_title: Cabinet nod for World Bank-funded Financial Sector Safety Net Strengthening Project
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers approved the proposal presented by the President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic stabilization and National Policies to enter in to  agreements to obtain a loan of USD 150 million from the World Bank for the implementation of the project to strengthen the safety net of the financial sector under World Bank funds.
